hiveArticle.title: In House Photos of Deo Bottle
hiveArticle.body:
A lazy Sunday has got better of me, I wanted to go out today for a trek but did not wake up in time. So done some productive work like cleaning the house, preparing food rather than ordering and then some in-house photography of the Deo bottles. All the photos are taken on my new Canon Lens 24mm, f2.8. Its been a week and I am already loving it. This being my first prime lens, and it was totally worth it. 

![IMG_1983.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTVh2yY8cgDbLVAYpsAZhB9wVhSQumvptC9RzqfwZ7BnN)
